snippet: As Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky is set to announce his presidential campaign on Tuesday, a television ad tethers him to President Obama’s policy on Iran as part of a $1 million ad buy painting him as “dangerous.”
abstract: As Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky is set to announce his presidential campaign on Tuesday, a television ad tethers him to President Obama’s policy on Iran as part of a $1 million ad buy painting him as “dangerous.”

headline.main: Ad Attacking Rand Paul on Iran Will Coincide With Opening of His Presidential Campaign
